predefinedQuestions.text: Is there literature supporting the rationale of gene-disease association?
What is the druggability of the target?
What is the competition status of the target? Are there advanced clinical programs?
For the target, what is the gene/protein expression level in the relevant tissue?

ui.landscapeDescription:
The data landscape illustrates the different types of data available and their interconnections. In this context, we have four main entities: Cell line, Tissue, Gene, and Drug.

- **Cell line**: This entity includes data on sample annotation, gene expression, mutation, and copy number.
- **Tissue**: Similar to the Cell line, the Tissue entity also includes data on sample annotation, gene expression, mutation, and copy number.
- **Gene**: The Gene entity provides gene annotation data based on ensembl 86.
- **Drug**: The Drug entity includes data from drug screens. This data provides insights into the effects of various drugs on the cell lines.

Furthermore, by hovering over the graph, you can click "show uploaded datasets" (filter icon) to view additional datasets that have been uploaded. Clicking on any node will provide additional information about that specific entity. You can then click on 'Show data' to start your analysis with, for example, all available human genes.

Alternatively, you can use the dataset cards located below the landscape to start your analysis. These cards provide a more detailed view of the individual datasets, allowing for a more focused exploration of the data.
ui.termsAndConditions: [AACR Project GENIE](https://www.aacr.org/professionals/research/aacr-project-genie/). By logging into Ordino you confirm that you will adhere to the [AACR Project GENIE Terms of Access](http://data.caleydo.org/app_data/GSOP-3_AACRProjectGENIETermsofUse.pdf) when using the AACR Project GENIE data.

welcomeMessage.message:
#### Welcome to our all-new Ordino!

Experience a host of new features, a modern look-and-feel, and numerous enhancements both visible and behind the scenes. Learn more about all new features and how to use them at http://vie-bio-docs.eu.boehringer.com/ordino.html. 

**Enjoy!**

For any questions or issues, please don’t hesitate to contact us, [Thomas Zichner](mailto:thomas.zichner@boehringer-ingelheim.com) and [Florian Ganglberger](mailto:florian_johann.ganglberger@boehringer-ingelheim.com).
